introduction: Civil war died down. The soldiers returned home from the front.A strong friendship links the three comrades, former Red commanders Langovoy, Zheltikov and senior among them, Uncle Sasha.All three friends work in the military headquarters. Uncle Sasha and Zheltikov are bachelors. They dwelt together in one room. Friends often come to visit a cozy apartment of Langovoy and his wife Masha, which married in the years of civil war. Masha was a loyal front Langovoy's comrad. Masha selflessly cared for Langovoy when he was fell ill. Some time later, Masha was leaving a rest to his mother. During her absence Langovoy falls in love with the woman which hi was rescued from the street accident. Langovoy's friends comdemn his behavior. Masha returned from the family grieved the incident. Finally Langovoy decides to return to his wife and ask her forgiveness.Civil war died down.
